Name: Piñata Attack
About the game: Piñata Attack is a party experience where the headset wearer attempts to defeat the Piñata in as short a time as possible. Whats the catch? The rest of the party gets to control the Piñata on the main monitor! Oh, and the Piñata fighter is blindfolded in VR. Peer through the blindfold, catch the rope with your bat, do anything you can to cheat your way to the fastest time. Controls: Mouse XY: Horizontal Piñata Placement Mouse Scroll: Vertical Piñata Placement VR Controller: Swingable item
